name: inline-feedback-widget
description: A lightweight JavaScript widget for collecting contextual user feedback with Obsidian export

scripts.build: cat src/storage.js src/context.js src/element-selector.js src/export.js src/ui.js src/widget.js > dist/feedback-widget.js && sed 's/\/\/.*$//g; /^[[:space:]]*$/d; s/^[[:space:]]*//g' dist/feedback-widget.js > dist/feedback-widget.min.js

author: Your Name
